reviewText: personal reviews are great and all but sometimes they miss the point of the word REVIEW. An editorial review of this would be nice to include for those of us who would not care to research anymore someplace else instead just make a decision to buy it or not.

Bob Larson is probably the most  under rated christain teacher/ evangelist of our times!!I learned so much more about defeating
evil and undue the self=defeating habits of a lifetime!!  GO BOB!!!!

Satan really had a grip on me thinking gay people might not be so bad, but boy was I wrong!  It's such a relief to finally be told all the answers to my questions by a man on a VHS tape, for a while I thought I'd have to actually think for myself and make my own moral judgements, but nope - I'm all set with Bob Larson!
